question:
Consider the following statements about the Rotavac vaccine:
  1. It prevents children against diarrhea
  2. It is India’s first designed vaccine that has received “pre-qualified” status by the World Health Organisation
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Rotavac vaccine has been developed by Hyderabad based Bharat Biotech International Limited. It was included in India’s national immunisation programme. The vaccine has been recently “pre-qualified” by the World Health Organisation. The “pre-qualified” status means that the vaccine can now be sold internationally to several countries. Rotavac vaccine protects against childhood diarrhoea caused by the rotavirus.
